name: semc
title: Space Exploration Magic Simplified
author: plexpt
description:
Space Exploration Magic Simplified, Improve your quality of life. Similar to  Space Exploration Simplified but more change. Change rocket fuel stack size, space-pipe length, burner-turbine max power output 1GW. Change rocket-fuel-with-ammonia just 10 oxygen and ammonia. delivery-cannon-capsule just need 0.1 heat-shielding. And  !!! Armstrong cyclotron jet turbine generator !!! 
太空探索简化，减少套娃，加速通关，主流程影响较小，放心食用。
